Reviews.Title: Gread Camera 420 TVL
Reviews.Author: scancctv
Reviews.Content: These small cameras are great, serve their purpose, night vision is 6 meters to 8 meters, with 6 mm lens with aperture angle of 75 ° to 80 °, and the colors are good, the colors are somewhat pale but you can not expect much with these increhibles prices .... I recommend to be careful with the wires that carry the canbles tests before starting the final installation, I give it 4 stars because the DVR has no buttons, if the remote control is damaged or lost, end of story Security System.: (

Reviews.Title: zmodo 4 ch h.264 - good product
Reviews.Author: mchusan
Reviews.Content: I tested this kit for three weeks without drawbacks-I set the DVR. I installed remote access with a public IP without problems. The cameras work 24 hours since well. I think it is a good product.

Reviews.Title: Good Security system for the price
Reviews.Author: skm
Reviews.Content: I bought this system after reading some reviews and it turn out to be much better than they say awesome product arrive on time easy set-up just pair with a 350Gb - 1Tb hdd and your good to go i  definitely recommend this system.

Reviews.Title: DVR security system
Reviews.Author: charles
Reviews.Content: Pros:  multiple fuctions including 4 outdoor nightvision cameras with 60ft of cable thats a plusCons:  No HHD, need to purschase separately and self install

Reviews.Title: Tricky to set up
Reviews.Author: RC Barker
Reviews.Content: Instructions need work, but after I got through  the installation  process the system worked well. I'm using it to monitor engines on my boat and I was pleasantly surprised how well the camera worked in a very low light level engine room. Overall good product that I would rate higher if it had better installation instructions.

Reviews.Title: Good sh%#
Reviews.Author: duke8786
Reviews.Content: 5 stars came on time works goodLike everything about it just tryn to see how I can get the audio to work with out extra materials "short cut"If u lookin for something and know electronic this is cake u can have the whole set up up in runnin in about 45 mins....good sh%#

Reviews.Title: Instructions Suck
Reviews.Author: Jared P
Reviews.Content: the instructions on the setup suck.. you kinda have to just figure it out on your own. the part for setting up your remote view through wifi on your phone is too complicated without instructions and I have been unable to get that part setup.other than that the picture is ok..

Reviews.Title: This system works but has MANY problems...
Reviews.Author: Kilroy
Reviews.Content: This unit should be taken off the line...It's capabilities are somewhat limited and it's features are buggy. The software they use, to run the system with, seems very old and inflexible. The web-based access is based on ActiveX controls which no browser, but Internet Explorer (which i dislike because if it's loose security) uses. ActiveX is an old and very out-dated technology that often freezes and isn't very reliable.None of the PTZ features or Iris features, that the software have in it, seem to work at all.The email feature is buggy and often hangs. As well as the FTP feature isn't very reliable. The network file-sharing feature.....forget it. It shows up on the network but doesn't let you into the system to get the files.The Zmodo software, its self, isn't all that reliable either and won't run on some of my machines (which are all setup the same way) and have the exact same hardware in them. I know, odd.With my remote, it shuts the system off but not ON...yeah, that's dumb. Also ,the strength of the IR is a bit weak and you have to aim it directly at the system to get anything going.If you have to shut the system down (for any reason), manually, it will "lose" the hard drive and you have to physically open the system up, pull out the cables, then put them back in again and bam, it sees your hard drive again. Also, the direction say it won't acknowledge any drive less than 100GB. They also claim that, if you don't use a "DVR" specific hard drive, a regular one will die out VERY fast if you're recording a lot.This system isn't as stable or feature-reach as one might expect it to be and, in all honesty, i wish i hadn't bought it. However, the time and shipping to send it back (out of my office time) would cost me more than i paid for it so i'll just make due.Plus, i went to the Zmodo website....their support is terrible, their live support put me in a que then said they were "not available" after 27 mins.I guess the one redeeming quality this system has is the Android app that allows you to monitor all your cameras. While not overly feature-rich...it does work well on WIFI. An internet feed, which i've tried, often just isn't all that good, the frame-rate was way too low.Amendment to review:Recently the remote has become strange and seems to just "ignore" me at times. I'll probably buy another system because the cameras, from time to time, tend to "wig out" and go dead for a short time. The cable they use isn't the best quality and it's shielding (against weather) really isn't impressive.I would say to avoid this product unless you're just really well-schooled in dealing with technical issues and know how to tweak every bit to make it stable.

Reviews.Title: works
Reviews.Author: august
Reviews.Content: il say the thing is prety good the cameras not camcorder goot put awsome night distance is as good as day if positiond right .  the packaging SUKS they would have gotn a 5 if it wasnt broke , il say i put screws in it it good( cant even notice with all screws in) but the fact is WOULD BE A 5  lolty ty

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: George Boozer "bowhunter"
Reviews.Content: I bought this system and ran it for about a week, and decided that I wanted more, so I ordered an 8 camera system, and put this one up for sale.  very clear video, and with help from ZModo tech support, relatively easy to set up.  Good price and good product. would buy again, and did!

Reviews.Title: Will not recommend this product
Reviews.Author: airus
Reviews.Content: 3 Stars for the Cameras, 1 Star for the DVR, 2 Stars Over All Average. The cameras are okay quality, however, the mounts that came with it are terrible ! 2 out of 4 broke upon install, a few don't even screw in at all. The DVR is very buggy; the time keeps on changing by itself. The menu are confusing and unintuitive (instruction/manual is definitely NOT intuitive at all). Remote Viewing took forever to setup. It will require a network technician or engineer to figure things out. It took me days to figure it out, despite that I've been working in the IT and Networking field for years. Will not recommend.

Reviews.Title: not at all happy
Reviews.Author: Shara
Reviews.Content: I returned it..... i first tried it with my mac and realized it didnt work.  then i noticed there was a broken wire.  I just was not happy

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING!
Reviews.Author: Genevieve Valadez
Reviews.Content: Being in and running a paranormal team in Texas these cameras are very impressive...they are perfect sizes and work well in conjunction with other investigative items...Worth having in your equipment.

Reviews.Title: price value
Reviews.Author: SLeven
Reviews.Content: for the price these work quite well the night vision works great also in no light conditions if you want a surveillance kit without spending a pound or a crown this will do the job

Reviews.Title: secirity kit ok but zero customer service
Reviews.Author: Daniel J Lechuga
Reviews.Content: Equipment is working as listed, tried to contact zmodo company to buy an extra remote control just in case mine gets broken or lost, received zero responce from company, what if is a real problem with cameras or dvr?

Reviews.Title: Muy bueno
Reviews.Author: Carlos Diaz
Reviews.Content: El grabador me parece muy bueno y fácil de instalar. el envió fue muy rápido y todo me llego en perfecto estado.

Reviews.Title: Not a complete recorder!
Reviews.Author: Barbara E. Clancy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this security system thinking everything I needed to get started was included.  It came without a recording device inside the recorder!!  I've tried several times to call Zmodo directly to find out if it was a mistake, but I've been on hold for over 25 minutes each time & haven't spoken with customer service yet!  Needless to say, my security system is not up & running.  They make it sound easy to install, when in reality, it's tougher than they portray.

Reviews.Title: Very Dissappointed
Reviews.Author: Albuquerque
Reviews.Content: This is a very, very, very inferior product.  STAY AWAY FROM IT!The technical support is non existent.  Supposed to be 24/7, but on line chat with any of the three Zmodo departments is never available.I could not get the network option to function.  The H9411 was detected but was always off line.The technical manuals are written in very poor English.  The Chinese can affort to hire good technical writers, but they don't  because they think Americans will buy their junk anyway.

Reviews.Title: Video security
Reviews.Author: Nikoloz
Reviews.Content: I am very happy that i have bought this equipment. I hope in the future i will be also use the services of this company

Reviews.Title: Doesn't record and in red..
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah D. Silsbee
Reviews.Content: I bought a set of these cameras for my home.. I am in the USN, when I got back from my deployment I hadd a technician come to my home and install these, IT DIDNT NOT HAVE THE ABILITY TO RECORD THE "RECORDING BOXES/SOFTWARE" HASN'T BEEN PUT IN THE RECEIVING BOX, THE CAMERAS SHOW UP IN RED.. REAL NICE AT NIGHT, RED AND BLACK...  I am NOT happy with these.. there is NO DISC to install to your computer.. Ive spent over 300$ finding out they are JUNK... And believe every one in my squadron (of1400 people plus the base Im stationed at (6000 people) WILL all be advised NOT to by this product NOR go through this seller.. "How do you sell a SECURITY RECORDING SYSTEM THAT DOESNT RECORD AND SHOWS UP IN RED.. MAKES NO SINCE...THANK YOU FOR THE ALMOST 600$ NOW IM OUT OF BECAUSE OF THIS JUNK"

ProductInfo.Features:
View Video Online with No Service Fees - View your DVR's live or recorded video footage on any PC.
Long time recording: - Base on the H.264 Compression, maximize the hard drive's recording time, as well as transfer video for viewing over the internet.
Network Remote Access - Access live video footage directly from your mobile phone or PC anytime anywhere
Advanced Motion Detection Recording - This allows you record only when motion is detected.
4 Professional Grade Weather Resistant  - See in the Dark with Automatic Night Vision .
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo 4CH H.264 Security Surveillance DVR Camera System & 4 Outdoor Night Vision Weatherproof Surveillance Cameras and No Hard Drive
